MapGenerator.MainStructure

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapGenerator.MainStructure.Map
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapGui

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class which holds references to Edge and Room data structure. It handles different formats of map output.
    Author:
    Lukas Jelinek

      • prepareData

        public void prepareData()
        Calculates states and neighbours for each field

      • printMapaData

        public java.lang.String printMapaData()
        Data block representing map
        Returns:
        String data based on each field state and wall type. One line one row. E.g.: -1:0:1;5:\n6:10:... -2 - empty field -1 - door 0 - horizontal line 1 - vertical line 2 - horizontal line with top edge -'- 3 - horizontal line with bottom edge -,- 4 - vertical line with right edge |- 5 - vertical line with left edge -| 6 - left top corner -' 7 - right top corner '- 8 - right down corner ,- 9 - left down corner -, 10 - cross -|-

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Graphical representation of the map. Created from ASCII symbols.
